column1: ‘P5’ contains the following provisions relating to annual transfers:

column3: The Annual Transfer Committee must be established by 1st June;
Applications  for  annual  transfers  must  be  called  before  30th  June,  with  the
closing date of applications being 31st July;
All annual transfer orders must be issued by 1st November; and
Annual transfer orders must be implemented on 1st January of each year.
